sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import VerticalSpacer from '../VerticalSpacer'
import FormGroup from '../FormGroup'
import Input from '../Input'
import FormGrid from '.'

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"formgrid"}}>{`FormGrid`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A component for building forms.`}</MDXTag>

__position={0} __code={'<VerticalSpacer>\n  <FormGrid>\n    <FormGroup id=\"name\" label=\"Name\">\n      <Input id=\"name\" name=\"name\" />\n    </FormGroup>\n    <FormGroup id=\"email\" label=\"Email\">\n      <Input id=\"email\" name=\"email\" />\n    </FormGroup>\n  </FormGrid>\n  <FormGrid>\n    <FormGroup id=\"phone\" label=\"Phone\">\n      <Input id=\"phone\" name=\"phone\" />\n    </FormGroup>\n    <FormGroup id=\"address\" label=\"Address\">\n      <Input id=\"address\" name=\"address\" />\n    </FormGroup>\n  </FormGrid>\n</VerticalSpacer>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,VerticalSpacer,FormGroup,Input,FormGrid}}>
  <VerticalSpacer>
    <FormGrid>
      <FormGroup
        id='name'
        label='Name'
      >
        <Input id='name' name='name' />
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup
        id='email'
        label='Email'
      >
        <Input id='email' name='email' />
      </FormGroup>
    </FormGrid>
    <FormGrid>
      <FormGroup
        id='phone'
        label='Phone'
      >
        <Input id='phone' name='phone' />
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup
        id='address'
        label='Address'
      >
        <Input id='address' name='address' />
      </FormGroup>
    </FormGrid>
  </VerticalSpacer>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It also supports nesting:`}</MDXTag>

__position={1} __code={'<FormGrid>\n  <FormGroup id=\"address\" label=\"Address\">\n    <Input id=\"address\" name=\"address\" />\n  </FormGroup>\n  <FormGrid>\n    <FormGroup id=\"neighborhood\" label=\"Neighborhood\">\n      <Input id=\"neighborhood\" name=\"neighborhood\" />\n    </FormGroup>\n    <FormGroup id=\"number\" label=\"Number\">\n      <Input id=\"number\" name=\"number\" />\n    </FormGroup>\n  </FormGrid>\n</FormGrid>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,VerticalSpacer,FormGroup,Input,FormGrid}}>

    <FormGroup
      id='address'
      label='Address'

    </FormGroup>
    <FormGrid>

      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup

      </FormGroup>
    </FormGrid>
  </FormGrid>
